name: Holiday Inn Express Ohio State Fair/Expo Center

reviews.text: From when I called to add a day because of weather I had Kevin who could not be more helpful and got me a room. I had he next morning and after that Mel and Jasmine were always there to give great directions and places to eat. Will stay here every year with this team. Thanks to all of you.
reviews.title: Fantastic Customer Service
tricky reservation
reviews.text: Thank you, Trusha

When we made our cell phone reversations, the person who accepted and confirmed our reservations did not say that they were not the actual Holiday Inn in columbus. When we arrived and found out that a third party was involved and that we weren't qualified for the priorityclub rewards. i fortunately could trace the reservation call. Trusha, the manager, was extremely helpful in finding out who represented themselves as the actual Holiday inn reservation center. The person to whom I gave my acct info and e-mail address was from a generic center. Trusha is to be thanked by the
reviews.title: Toledo Traveler

reviews.text: hI organization for here polite business acumen and helped us straighten out the issue
reviews.title: Short Columbus Stay

reviews.text: My recommendcation to Holiday Inn Corp. Is that it be stated up front that one is going through a third party thereby paying more. The internet side I used to find the phone number said hix/Columbus 701 E. hudson st. The traveler is not aware of what is happening and that is deceptive.
reviews.title: OSU hospital stay....

reviews.text: We used this hotel as a home base for an Ohio State orientation. While Hotwire lists it as being near OSU, there are so many other choices in nicer areas closer to campus. Driving there from campus, you will go by blocks of boarded up and condemned buildings. This is not why the bad review, however, I can deal with hotels in bad neighborhoods.
reviews.title: No customer service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In packing up, I left a Kindle Fire High Speed charger and separate lightning USB cord. Yes, this was my fault, and the hotel is not responsible for missing items. However, I realized it immediately, and because we were in a session, had to wait two hours to return. When we came back to hotel, the cord and charger had been removed from the room. However, the housekeeper insists she did not see it. The head housekeeper said he returned to the room, and also did not see it. Unless it walked away on its own, someone is not telling the truth. I know 100% I left it in room, and in two hours it is gone? We asked for compensation, which manager said she could not do. She said she would take 20% off a future stay for our trouble. (We had to wait 40 minutes while everyone searched for the charger and cord). There is no way I would ever stay at a hotel where items left by guests are not held until at least the end of the day. I could see if I came back days later, but this was two hours. The manager sent me an email after I contacted her to follow up on whether the item was found. It included a link to an Amazon listing where I could re-purchase the item which was never found by the hotel. The good thing is the breakfast was great, and the stocking people seemed to work quickly and efficiently.
reviews.title: April 2013

reviews.text: We had a great time! The hotel is clean, the staff friendly and helpful!! We were particularly happy with the restaurant advice given to us by Karl at the front desk. He was very helpful in any need that we may have had.
reviews.title: Clean hotel/Friendly staff

reviews.text: I was also impressed by how well staffed and how well managed this hotel is. We would definitely stay here again!!
reviews.title: Another excellent Holiday Inn Express

reviews.text: This hotel is by far the cleanest hotel I have stayed at in years! ALL staff members are very friendly! The cookies set out in the evening are yummy. Breakfast is great an, of course, it has the Holiday Inn Express wonderful pancake machine. Very QUIET hotel. Close to the fairgrounds, expo center and OSU. Easy to get to from the freeway.
reviews.title: Extremely Pleased and Thoroughly Impressed!

reviews.text: I had read other reviews about this property and was a little leary about the location. However, it was not bad at all. It is right off the expressway and not quite into the bad area of town. We had a king executive room and it was very clean and the bed was comfortable. The staff at the hotel was very friendly. The price is right for an over night stay. I would stay here again.
reviews.title: Decent price

reviews.text: At 7 p.m. found out our flight was late. Called hotel and said hold room (which was prepaid) we will be late. Arrive at 2 a.m. with my daughter and we are informed there were no rooms. Night desk person says it's a common experience at hotel because they do not turn off on-line booking when hotel reaches capacity. Hotel sends us to nearby hotel. I ask for a call from the manager. Never received a call. New hotel is full so we are sent back to Holiday Inn Express where we stay 2 nights. I will say it was clean and quiet. However, reservation system and lack of phone call is unacceptable. I will say that they refunded one night's stay, but still am steamed they never called to discuss fact that we were forced back into the night at 2 a.m. after making extra effort of calling to make sure they kept our prepaid room.
reviews.title: Had Reservation, Called to say flight Delayed, No Room at the Inn!

reviews.text: they have great service and trusha and lj are very helpful receptionist. the beds are very comfortable and the food is amazing. i really enjoyed the relaxing pool they have. the gym needs some weight but it still have everything you'll need for a good work out. you should def. stay in this hotel !!!
reviews.title: great place to stay

reviews.text: I was greeted by a friendly and helpful receptionist. My room was ready. The bathroom had a sour odor to it so they cleaned it again and it was slightly better...so I got some febreeze, and that fixed it. The bed was heavenly. I like the white comforter and sheets so you can tell how clean they are. The towels were soft and plentiful. The room had a coffee maker and microwave and refrigerator all of which worked well. I found all the staff to be helpful and pleasant. the breakfast was on time and plentiful also. There was plenty of parking. The pool was well cared for and clean. The bathroom was large and roomy( I love that part)and clean. No mold. I just Love this place. It is close to the fairgrounds and the interstate.
reviews.title: Great place close to the Ohio State Fairgrounds

reviews.text: Upon entering the hotel, I was promptly greeted. The lobby area was clean, and there were fresh cookies for guests. When I got to my room, I received a phone call making sure everything was okay and letting me know to contact the front desk if I needed anything. The room was clean, but the towels were a little dingy. I thought one was dirty, but it was just stained. The air conditioning was also very loud, but I was pretty tired every night, so it didn’t bother me too much. They did have breakfast every morning, which I did not get to try, but I heard it was pretty good. There’s also a Wendy’s right next door. About 5-10 minutes away, there’s a shopping center with tons of good restaurants. Overall, my stay was pleasant.
reviews.title: Worked for me

reviews.text: The minute my partner & I stepped onto the property , Hugo @ front desk was a friendly professional. We have had nothing but good, courteous and welcoming staff while here. We look forward to the last two nights we have, here @ this excellent little property. This hotel/ inn, has a great young professional team that is friendly and genuine. Pleasure is entirely ours as we enjoy our business trip ! D. F. & M.P.
reviews.title: Hugo makes excellent evening desk person !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My fiance and I came to Columbus for a quick one day trip from Cleveland. We had been stuck in traffic for over an hour and were tired and weary, looking for a place to stay. After a round about drive through OSU's campus and downtown, we happened upon this hotel. When we arrive, the desk manager, Karl, was very sympathetic. He gave us a great room at a great price, made our stay very comfortable, and gave us great suggestions for where to go in town. We will be back!
reviews.title: Great customer service!

reviews.text: Was greeted by a very friendly staff person. Check-in went smoothly. East access wifi and a very nice breakfast. Our room was a little dated and will need some cosmetic touchup soon. Seemed to have installed new carpet on the second floor hall.
reviews.title: Easy Access to Downtown

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I went for a Valentine's weekend. This hotel really made it special. The welcome board in the lobby was very nice. I was greeted as a Priority member and thanked for my loyalty. Trusha was WONDERFUL at check-in. She was very nice and friendly. When she heard it was our Valentine's present to each-other, she upgraded our room at no cost! The pool was perfect and VERY clean. The room was nice and spacious and also spotlessly clean! Debbie kept everything very well stocked during breakfast the next day and had a wonderful smile. We found out that it was only her second day. You could have convinced me it was her second year! What an amazing stay! It I could give it 10 stars, I would! We will certainly go back and tell everyone to stay her. All Holiday Inns should visit and take their cue from this one!
reviews.title: All hotels should be like this!

reviews.text: Gold star, A+, WTG!!!!!
reviews.title: TRUSHA ROCKS!

aka: Holiday Inn Express Ohio State Fair/Expo Hotel
description: The Holiday Inn Express Ohio State University and Expo Center hotel features complimentary high-speed wireless Internet, breakfast bar, indoor pool, fitness room and a meeting room. We also feature a variety of suite rooms including Jacuzzi and executive suites. The Holiday Inn Express Ohio State University and Expo Center hotel is located 1/2 mile from the Ohio Expo Center and Fairgrounds, Crew Stadium, and Ohio Historical Society as well as 1.3 miles from The Ohio State University. Our hotel is less than 5 minutes from downtown Columbus, the Columbus Convention Center and the Port Columbus International Airport (CMH) is a short 10 minute drive.
